summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6055 for the improvement of 25th Avenue West from West Smith Street to West Halladay Street by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82761, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
